newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.AFRICA'S ESKOM STUDIES FISH-FROM-COAL PLAN.
newsitem.headline: S.AFRICA'S ESKOM STUDIES FISH-FROM-COAL PLAN.

text.p: South Africa's Eskom [ESCJ.CN] utility said on Friday it was studying the possibility of growing edible fish in heated water from its power plants.
Spokesman Peter Adams said a pilot project was being carried out at Eskom's Kriel coal-fired power station to assess if small aquaculture enterprises could be established on a commercial basis.
Many fish species grow more quickly if kept in heated water.
